data.message: Too bad Facebook can't come up with an interactive support team to help people with hacked accounts. My husbands account was hacked and the help center prompts aren't sufficient. Hackers are smart. They change info. Before you come up with anything else, come up with a human interaction feature for support.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that you had this experience, Kimberly. If you have any feedback you'd like to share with our team, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2pEXXpu. Feedback from our community helps us continue to improve Facebook for everyone. -Joe
